Question: However, Brady led the Patriots to two late touchdowns, to hand this person his first loss of the season, 24–20.
Hints: It was this person's 4th game-winning drive (35th of his career) this season.
This person was elected to Phi Beta Kappa Society in 1997.
In a Week 14 win against Atlanta, this person threw for five touchdowns and was named player of the week a second time.
